snippet: Samaje Perine is set to surpass all the great Oklahoma running backs and claim the school's career rushing mark....
lead_paragraph: Samaje Perine is set to surpass all the great Oklahoma running backs and claim the school's career rushing mark.

headline.main: Perine Nears Billy Sims' Oklahoma Career Rushing Record
headline.print_headline: Perine Nears Billy Sims' Oklahoma Career Rushing Record
